title: Pioneering the preparation of porous PIM-1 membranes for enhanced water vapor flow
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9631-9645
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08398E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Esra Caliskan, Sergey Shishatskiy, Volker Abetz, Volkan Filiz
In this study, porous membranes of polymers of intrinsic microporosity (PIM-1) were prepared by non-solvent induced phase inversion (NIPS) and investigated for water vapor transport in view of their application in membrane distillation (MD).
